channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.description: 🔴 12:05 Air alarm to Kharkiv Oblast follow the following messages.#Kharkiv_Bost This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
